title: Is this a sign of the true borders of the United States and Mexico?
subtitle: A picture that allegedly shows a United States bordermark that says "a lot of free things ahead of us" is -- I figured that -- nothing more than a weak digital editing.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A sign on the borders of the United States and under the auspices of the Democratic Party tells Mexican travellers that there are "a lot of free things in the future."
